r.s: Extension for IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby
r.d: This extension supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby databases.
r.n: Adding support for query time out. Fixing problem with DATE/TIME datatype. i5/OS Add new attribute DB2_I5_JOB_SORT_ON/OFF (php.ini ibm_db2.i5_job_sort). i5/OS Fix BIGINT string type to help with larger values. i5/OS Fix "early" terminate fetch loops due to CLOB/BLOB zero length. i5/OS Fix db2_pclose() to allow reset persistent connections.
